data.text: Yehova imvani pemphero langa;
Musandibisire nkhope yanu
Pakuti masiku anga akupita ngati utsi;
Mtima wanga wakanthidwa ndipo ukufota ngati udzu;
Chifukwa cha kubuwula kwanga kofuwula
Ndili ngati kadzidzi wa ku chipululu,
Ndimagona osapeza tulo; ndakhala
Tsiku lonse adani anga amandichita chipongwe;
Pakuti ndimadya phulusa ngati chakudya changa
chifukwa cha ukali wanu waukulu,
Masiku anga ali ngati mthunzi wa kumadzulo;
Koma Inu Yehova, muli pa mpando wanu waufumu kwamuyaya;
Inu mudzadzuka ndi kuchitira chifundo Ziyoni
Pakuti miyala yake ndi yokondedwa kwa atumiki anu;
Mitundu ya anthu idzaopa dzina la Yehova,
Pakuti Yehova adzamanganso Ziyoni
Iye adzayankha pemphero la anthu otayika;
Zimenezi zilembedwe chifukwa cha mibado ya mʼtsogolo,
“Yehova anayangʼana pansi kuchokera ku malo ake opatulika mmwamba,
kuti amve kubuwula kwa anthu a mʼndende,
Kotero dzina la Yehova lidzalengezedwa mu Ziyoni
pamene mitundu ya anthu ndi maufumu
Iye anathyola mphamvu zanga pa nthawi ya moyo wanga;
Choncho Ine ndinati:
Pachiyambi Inu munakhazikitsa maziko a dziko lapansi
Izi zidzatha, koma Inu mudzakhalapo;
Koma Inu simusintha,
Ana a atumiki anu adzakhala pamaso panu;
